sense.gloss: to throw, to cast (e.g. vote, light, shadow)
to devote oneself (e.g. to a cause)
to take advantage of, to make full use of
to fit well with, to match with, to be in tune with

sdata.j: ↑反対↑↓はんたい↓↑票↑↓ひょう↓を|↑投↑↓とう↓じる|つもりだ。
あんな↑状況↑↓じょうきょう↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑身↑↓み↓を|↑投↑↓とう↓じる|とは、↑君↑↓きみ↓も↑考↑↓かんが↓えが↑足↑↓た↓りなかったな。
sdata.e: You should've known better than to put yourself in that situation.

sdata.j: あんな↑状況↑↓じょうきょう↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑身↑↓み↓を|↑投↑↓とう↓じる|とは、↑君↑↓きみ↓も↑考↑↓かんが↓えが↑足↑↓た↓りなかったな。
sdata.e: You should have known better than to put yourself in that situation.
